__e: You bust out of jails maybe, Or mud holes like I was in,
Only way to keep out of jail is to come clean with us!
He died when I was 17 trying to shoot his way out of jail.
Perhaps by doing this you hope to escape your guilt.
Only way to keep out of jail is to come clean with us!
That the world isn't wide enough, long enough, to let me escape the memory of your touch.
The distance between us is great, but you cannot escape me.
I tell you, you can't walk out on me now, I won't let you.
You can't escape me now I wanted you for years!
You can get away with murder. (GIGGLING)
But if such an assassin can't escape a fire, then what good is he?
And you are running into a court-martial.
I tell you, you can't walk out on me now, I won't let you.
You can't escape me now I wanted you for years!
What I'm trying to tell you is that... It would be very easy for me to try to escape again, Into your world this time.
She comes and takes me down to the beach, picks me up later, whenever she can get away from the hospital.
I was back on that high bed in London, And this time, I wasn't trying To escape what happened to us.

It does its name more harm if the story leaks out and we've done nothing about it, Colonel.

Everybody wants to escape in the good weather.
